com.gembox.spreadsheet

Class FormattedCharacterRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.FormattedCharacterRange

  • public final class FormattedCharacterRange
extends Object
    Represents a range of characters within the cell or comment text.
    See Also:
    In-line Text Formatting example, Comments example
